# FadeCommand.FadeDirection

**Enumeration**

A value that represents the direction of the fade command.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FadeDirection
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **FadeCommand.FadeDirection.in**: A value that represents fading in of the video frames from a requested color.
- **FadeCommand.FadeDirection.out**: A value that represents fading out of the video frames to a requested color.
